archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.1.7c: c) review by an independent EUDA specialist (e.g. an individual who does not work in the local environment, and is highly skilled in the functionality of EUDA).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
